𒋚 ≈ …𒑖𒋰𒐍

𒂄 šah₂ Sau sow 𓃟

𒂄 ŠULᵈᵒⁿ 𓃟 𓏏 süldő "shoat" (young, weaned pig)

𒂄 DUN dunkel dark 𒂄 dur9 "donkey" 𒀲𒀴 dur3

𒂄 dun ⇔ donkey 𓃘 𒀲 **

𒂄 dun ⇔ dung 𒉆𒂄 digging

𒂄 zu7 ≈ 𒍪 zu "sei" "as if" 𒐊𒄄𒅔 i.gi₄.in 𒂄 "then again" #mindê

𒂄 ŠUL 𒋚 ŠAḪUL suhlen

𒉌 sul suš₂ @ 𒂄 ŠUL sus “grease” @ Sau 𒂄 ŠUL 𒉌𒂄 са́ла sála salza : 𒉌𒂄 i₃-šah₂ išahᵐᵃ #šēmu شَحْم šaḥm Sahm Sahne saimo smout ŝmalco Schmalz šēmu•lik 𒉌𒂄 i₃-šah₂ išʷah saw̄én @sew/swine grease 𒉌𒂄 i₃-šah₂ išᵖah speķis Speck @ pork szalonna sertészsír strutto λαρδί lardí "lard"

𒂄;𒍪𒌌 zul; zu-ul ŠUL Siel "water" ⇔ Saar

𒀭𒂄𒄀 Shulgi 𒂄𒄀 SHUL-GI <> Shar Zar <> Egypt
